name: Harikrishna Sureshkumar Pillai
positioning: I work at the intersection of business workflows, data platforms, and AI systems in regulated environments.
summary: Senior Business Systems Analyst with a focus on enterprise data platforms and AI/ML readiness. I specialize in translating complex business workflows into scalable data solutions within highly regulated financial services. My approach emphasizes system correctness, data governance, and cross-functional delivery.

about.philosophy: I am energized by problems that require both technical precision and strategic clarity. In regulated environments, 'good enough' is never enough—systems must be correct, auditable, and scalable. I like to work at the edge of emerging technology (like AI readiness) while maintaining the grounded stability that enterprise operations demand.
about.howIWork: I believe in systems thinking. Whether it's a SQL optimization or a platform migration, I start with the 'why' and ensure the technical implementation serves the business goal without compromising on compliance or data integrity.

experience.narrative: At CIBC, I lead the analysis and delivery of enterprise data and AI readiness initiatives. Working within Capital Markets and Wealth Management, I bridge the gap between technical data engineering and executive business requirements.
bullets: Coordinated with stakeholders to define platform requirements for Azure-based data solutions.
Performed SQL-based analysis to validate data quality for downstream ML applications.
Facilitated Databricks integration to enhance processing for large-scale financial datasets.
Managed regulatory compliance communications between business and engineering teams.

experience.narrative: During my tenure at Walmart Canada, I focused on operations at scale, implementing metrics-driven execution to optimize process flows within enterprise systems.
bullets: Optimized process workflows for large-scale retail operations using data-driven insights.
Led cross-functional teams to implement system enhancements that improved operational throughput.
Developed automated reporting tools to track enterprise-level KPIs and performance metrics.
Enhanced data integrity across supply chain and logistics platforms through rigorous analysis.

experience.narrative: Managed the lifecycle of data platform enhancements and business system migrations for core financial operations.
bullets: Developed comprehensive SQL queries to support executive decision-making.

projects.title: AI-Assisted Operations Insights
projects.oneLine: Optimizing enterprise forecasting through data readiness.
projects.problem: Raw enterprise data lacked the structure and quality required for reliable AI-driven forecasting.
projects.approach: Led a data readiness assessment to identify gaps in existing silos and implemented SQL-based validation frameworks.
projects.constraints: Strict data privacy regulations and legacy infrastructure limitations.
projects.outcome: Established a foundation for AI readiness, reducing data cleaning time by 40% for future ML initiatives.

projects.title: Enterprise Metrics & Reconciliation Framework

projects.problem: Disparate reporting across business units led to data inconsistencies in executive dashboards.

projects.constraints: High-volume transactional data requiring near real-time accuracy.
projects.outcome: Improved data accuracy by 99% and provided a single source of truth for cross-functional leadership.
